balance sheet.translation[0].definitions: a document showing a company’s financial position and wealth at a particular time, often the last day of the financial year
balance sheet.translation[1].definitions: a document showing a company’s financial position and wealth at a particular time, often the last day of its financial year
The company performed well last year, and has a healthy balance sheet with a good amount of cash.
a clean balance sheet (=without debt or without too much debt)
